concept.title: Linkus Server
concept.shortdesc: Release notes for Linkus server on the Yeastar K2 IPPBX.

ul.li: Fixed the issue of the push notification for Linkus calls: With Presence set to Do Not Disturb, members in a Ring Group could still receive incoming calls.
Fixed the display issue of extensions: On Linkus Mobile Client, not all registered extensions were displayed on Extension list.
Fixed the issue that members in a queue didn't receive notifications when there're incoming calls.

p.b: This version updates the following, you need to simultaneously upgrade Linkus clients to the latest version (iOS version: 2.9.10; Android version: 2.9.6), or Linkus may not work.

ul.li: Added compatibility with PBX Contacts feature.
Optimized Linkus iOS Push.

section.title: Version 2.5.9
section.p:
Released Date: December 17, 2019
Fixed the LCS (Linkus Cloud Service) issue: When the mounted network drive disconnected with PBX, users failed to change password on Linkus Mobile Client.
Fixed the following Conference issues.
Display issue of conference members.
Occasionally failed to exit from a conference.

section.title: Version 2.5.1
section.p:
Released Date: December 12, 2019
Optimized the mechanism of applying configuration changes to improve the system stability.
You don't need to click Apply button to reload Asterisk if you save unchanged configurations.
If no Apply button appears after you save some specific configuration changes, then the configurations can be saved without reloading Asterisk.

ul.li: Increased the number of extensions of Linkus.
Added support for Linkus Cloud Service.
Fixed the issue of Linkus Call: The Linkus user in the ring group could not answer the call, which is transferred from another ring group after timeout.
Fixed the issue of Linkus Email: The login QR code could not be displayed if the email was sent to Gmail, Whitebox, and Outlook.
Fixed the issue of Linkus Call: If All Busy Mode for SIP Forking was enabled, the Linkus client, which was a Ring Group member could not receive calls.
Improved the Linkus stability.
Improved the Linkus stability.
Improved the Linkus stability.
Added support for Linkus for Windows Desktop and Linkus for Mac Desktop.
Added support for forcing logout of Linkus desktop client on Linkus mobile client.
Added support for MiPush, Huawei Push, and JPush.
Added support for Background Mode function on Linkus Android client.
Added supported for logging in Linkus by email address.
Improved the security of the Linkus login.
Expand the expiration time of QR code and login link that are in the Linkus email to 24 hours.
Optimized the Linkus Email Template.
Optimized the Linkus login link.
Optimized the Linkus email template.
Fixed the issue that Linkus server would not be updated if the local IP address of the PBX was changed.
Added Privacy Policy Agreement and Data Processing Agreement.
Fixed the issue that Linkus call push would fail.
Fixed the Linkus iOS push issue.
Optimized the extension status on Linkus client.
